photorealistic.name: Photorealistic
photorealistic.description: Ultra-realistic, highly detailed monster portraits with cinematic lighting
photorealistic.base_prompt: Create an ultra detailed photorealistic Dungeons and Dragons monster portrait
photorealistic.suffix: Square format 1:1 aspect ratio for game interface

anime.name: Anime Style
anime.description: Japanese anime and manga inspired artwork with vibrant colors
anime.base_prompt: Create an anime-style fantasy monster illustration
anime.suffix: Square format 1:1 aspect ratio, anime key visual style

studio_ghibli.name: Studio Ghibli
studio_ghibli.description: Whimsical, painterly style inspired by Studio Ghibli films
studio_ghibli.base_prompt: Create a Studio Ghibli inspired fantasy creature artwork
studio_ghibli.suffix: Square format 1:1 aspect ratio, painted illustration style

dark_fantasy.name: Dark Fantasy
dark_fantasy.description: Gothic, dark, and atmospheric artwork with horror elements
dark_fantasy.base_prompt: Create a dark fantasy horror monster portrait
dark_fantasy.suffix: Square format 1:1 aspect ratio, dark and atmospheric

comic_book.name: Comic Book
comic_book.description: Bold comic book and graphic novel style artwork
comic_book.base_prompt: Create a comic book style monster illustration
comic_book.suffix: Square format 1:1 aspect ratio, comic panel style

watercolor.name: Watercolor
watercolor.description: Traditional watercolor painting style with soft edges and flowing colors
watercolor.base_prompt: Create a watercolor painting of a fantasy monster
watercolor.suffix: Square format 1:1 aspect ratio, traditional watercolor on paper

pixel_art.name: Pixel Art
pixel_art.description: Retro pixel art style reminiscent of classic video games
pixel_art.base_prompt: Create a pixel art sprite of a fantasy monster
pixel_art.suffix: Square format 1:1 aspect ratio, pixel perfect at 64x64 scaled up

minimalist.name: Minimalist
minimalist.description: Simple, clean designs with minimal details and bold shapes
minimalist.base_prompt: Create a minimalist geometric representation of a fantasy monster
minimalist.suffix: Square format 1:1 aspect ratio, clean minimalist design
